text: This is a sample dialogue. Click to advance.
This is part 2 of the sample dialogue. Hopefully you can see this.

This is part 3 of the dialogue. Sometimes dialogues can get kind of long. I'm going to keep writing in this text box to see how much text we can handle displaying. I wonder if it will overflow or just resize the box.
This is the last text snippet. Advancing should close the text box.
This is a sample dialogue. The background image should just be the website background.
You can accomplish this by leaving out the 'backgroundImage' field in the JSON file.
